alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:05PM EDT until July 20 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR PORTAGE...SOUTHEASTERN GEAUGA...MEDINA...NORTHERN SUMMIT AND SOUTHERN LORAIN COUNTIES... At 805 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mantua to Cuyahoga Falls to near Wellington, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Ravenna, Cuyahoga Falls, Brunswick, Kent, Hudson, Wadsworth, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Wellington, Lodi, Garrettsville, Mantua, Chippewa Lake, Stow, Aurora and Brecksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
